contentrichtext.text: {{Chinese name|[[Zhao (surname)|Zhao]]}} '''Zhao Chengliang''' ([[Chinese language|Chinese]]: 赵陈亮; [[Pinyin]]: Zhào Chéngliàng; born 1 June 1984 in [[Qujing]]) is a [[PR China|Chinese]] [[race walking|race walker]]. Zhao won the 50 km walk event at the [[Athletics at the 11th National Games of the People's Republic of China|11th Chinese National Games]] in 2009. ==Achievements== {| {{AchievementTable|Event=yes}} |- !colspan="6"|Representing {{CHN}} |- |2004 |[[2004 IAAF World Race Walking Cup|World Race Walking Cup]] |[[Naumburg]], [[Germany]] |19th |50 km | |- |2005 |[[2005 World Championships in Athletics|World Championships]] |[[Helsinki, Finland]] |5th |[[2005 World Championships in Athletics - Men's 50 km Walk|50 km]] | |- |2006 |[[2006 IAAF World Race Walking Cup|World Race Walking Cup]] |[[La Coruña]], [[Spain]] |8th |50 km | |- |2007 |[[2007 World Championships in Athletics|World Championships]] |[[Osaka, Japan]] |— |[[2007 World Championships in Athletics - Men's 50 kilometres walk|50 km]] |DSQ |- |2008 |[[Athletics at the 2008 Summer Olympics|Olympic Games]] |[[Beijing]], [[PR China]] |21st |[[Athletics at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Men's 50 kilometres walk|50 km]] |3:56:47 |- |2009 |[[2009 World Championships in Athletics|World Championships]] |[[Berlin, Germany]] |15th |[[2009 World Championships in Athletics – Men's 50 kilometres walk|50 km]] | |} ==References== *{{iaaf name|id=200852}} {{Use dmy dates|date=September 2010}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Zhao, Chengliang | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chinese race walker | DATE OF BIRTH = 1 June 1984 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zhao, Chengliang}} [[Category:1984 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Chinese racewalkers]] [[Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2008 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Olympic athletes of China]] [[Category:Male racewalkers]] [[Category:Athletes from Yunnan]] [[Category:People from Qujing]] {{PRChina-athletics-bio-stub}}
